Hello! ሰላም！

Finally, a Tigrinya<>English Dictionary for PC and Mobile phones!

We’ve built the first full Tigrinya<>English dictionary for PC and Mobile phones. Access via desktop, laptop, tablet and mobile phones, wherever you are.

Download the app today

What does it do?

  • Search by English or Tigrinya words, with both alphabets.
  • View the definition, grammatical info and examples of use.
  • Over 40,000 Tigrinya words defined.
  • Access online or offline.

Got Ideas?

Are we missing a word? We’re adding to the dictionary all the time but let us know if you’ve spotting something we missed.

Our team is busy! We’re working on some other ideas to make the dictionary even better. Got feedback? We’d love to hear it. Get in touch at info@tigrinyadictionary.co.uk.
